children.name: Team
children.description:
Base—Team
You can build up your own battle team at your base.

Team Structure
Team consists of 3 squads. Every squad consists of 1 front slot and 2 rear slots. All 9 slots will be unlocked with leveling up fo your base.
nEdit Team
Your Autobots and Decepticon characters can be organized into your team simultaneously and each character occupies 1 slot. However, Combiner occupies 3 slots.

Adjust Team
Tap empty slot to add new member or drag members to change slot with other members.

children.name: Combiner
children.description:
Base—Combiner
Some Tramformers can combine to a new transformer called Combiner, who is very powerful in Transformers world.

Strength
Members' strength of Combiner constitutes the Combiner's strength. Since Combiner levels up in terms of the XP got by every members, Combiner grows slower.

In Team
When in team, Combiner occupies 3 slots of a squad. Only when the members of Combiner are not in team alone, serving in HQ, or in training, can they join your team as Combiner.

View Details
You can view every member of Combiner you got through Base->Combiner

children.name: Character
children.description:
Base—Character
Characters can join your team to battle or enter HQ, etc. Characters have 5 rarities in terms of their abilities.

Culture
You can culture characters by consuming Culture Energon.

Power up
You can enhance characters significantly by consuming required Transmetal, if characters reached the requirement of Rank-up.

Impart
You can use characters you don't want to impart his XP to other Characters. Keep in mind that after imparting, characters served as materials will be dismissed and the Energon and Transmetal consumed will be returned to some partially.

children.name: HQ
children.description:
Base—HQ
Characters who are not in battle team can serve in HQ in every section in the base. In terms of their abilities, they can provide bonus to their production accordingly. Characters in HQ can also get XP from other characters' battle.

children.name: Tech
children.description:
Bas—Tech
Developing Tech of Base will increase characters abilities. The upper limit of Tech level unlocks in terms of increasing of Base level.

children.name: Resource
children.description:
Base—Resource
Resources such as Space Coin can be produced as time passes. By claiming the resources to start next production.

children.name: Training
children.description:
Base—Training
Characters get XP by training. Nevertheless, Combiner and characters in team or serve in HQ cannot do Training.

children.name: Gear
children.description:
Base—Gear
Equip gears to increase characters abilities.

Type
There are 3 types of gears. Weapon increases Attack; Armor increases Defence; and Power increases Speed. Each gear has 5 rarities in terms of their strength.

Upgrade
You can upgrade your gears by using Space Coin to increase gears level and strength. Level of gears is limited by Base level.

children.name: Skill
children.description:
Base—Skill
Characters can equip skill to power up their strength, use skills in battle, and provide bonus in the production in base.

Type
In terms of skills function, there are 3 types, which are passive skills increasing characters' abilities; battle skills used in battle; and production skills providing bonus in the production in your base. Each character has a gift skill and can equip 2 other skills. Skills also have 5 rarities according to their strength.

Upgrade
You can upgrade skills by consuming other skills. Skills become more powerful by upgrading. Skill level is limited by Base level.

children.name: Chip
children.description:
Base—Chip
Characters can increases their 8 abilities by equipping chips. 

Chip Slot
Chip slot will be unlocked with the increasing of characters level. Characters can equip 8 chips at most.

Fuse
Chips of same kind can be fused to higher rank of this kind.

children.name: Cyberkey
children.description:
Base—Cyberkey
Cyberkey is the soul of Tranformers, which can be use to create new characters or exchanged to items to enhance Transformers.

Required numbers of Fuse
Cyberkeys of the same kind can be fused to new characters.

Exchange
Cyberkeys can be exchanged for Transmetal of various rarities which can be used to enhance characters.

children.name: Item
children.description:
Base—Item
Items and packs are stored here. You can view item details before using them.

children.name: Rarity up
children.description:
Base—Rarity up
 Characters can be scanned to a higher rarity。

children.name: Story
children.description:
Battle—Story
You can develop your base, lead your team to triumph by playing Story Mode of Transformers G1

Difficulties
As one chapter of normal mode is cleared, hard mode will be unlocked. As hard mode is cleared, elite mode will be unlocked.

children.name: Arena
children.description:
Battle—>Arena
You can challenge other plays at Arena and get high ranking by defeat them to get much Culture Energon as rewards according to your ranking.

children.name: Fragment Scramble
children.description:
Battle—Fragment
Challenge other players whose strength are at your level. Defeat them to get skill fragment. Scramble times are limited every day. 

Fuse
Required number of fragments can be fused to get new skills.

children.name: Combiner Raid
children.description:
Battle—Combiner Raid
 Stages of Combiner Raid will open according to the Commander's level. Attack the Combiners there to get their cyber keys.

children.name: Trial
children.description:
Battle—Trial
You have limited chances to challenge every day. Challenge step by step to win the precious evolve cubes.

children.name: World Boss
children.description:
Battle—World Boss
Commanders from all over the world get together, challenging the huge regular World Boss, Quintesson Judge every day, and win abundant rewards according to your contribution.

children.name: Tower
children.description:
Battle—Tower
Challenge from the first floor to as high as you can every day. You can sweep the floors you have succeeded to challenge. You will get plenty of rewards when you win in this tower.

Tower Update
Tower updates every day. You can challenge repeatedly.

children.name: Daily Login
children.description:
Event—Daily Login
You can get daily bonus by login every day. Total login days will be counted and reset every month. The more you login, the more rare rewards you can get.

children.name: Pack Code
children.description:
Event—Pack Code
 You can input pack code of various media and events to get rewards

children.name: Novice 7 Days
children.description:
Event—Novice 7 Days
The newcomers can claim plenty of rewards according to the login date from the first day after signing up to the seventh day.

children.name: Recharging Chamber
children.description:
Event—Recharging Chamber
Recharging Chamber will be open twice a day regularly. You can recharge to regain your action points.

children.name: Limit Event
children.description:
Event—Limit Event
There will be some time-limited events in this game. Don't forget to take part in them.

children.name: Month Card
children.description:
Event—Month Card
If you buy it, you will get a good value pack and a privilege to get the Cyberticket for the next 30 days after daily login.

children.name: Ally
children.description:
Social—Ally
You can be in alliance with other plays in Tranformers world.

children.name: Union
children.description:
Socio—Union
You can join the Base Union with other plays.

children.name: Message
children.description:
Social—Message
Three kinds of message will deliver into your message box: System, Battle Report, Ally, Comment.

children.name: Chat
children.description:
Social—Chat
You can use  loudspeakers to send message at Chat window to all plays in your server. Every time you send a message, it cost you one loudspeaker.

children.name: Leaderboard
children.description:
Social—Leaderboard
All users will be ranked by their levels and powers. Those who have reached Lv10 can be ranked in the level board. Those whose powers are over 9000 can be ranked in the power board.

children.name: Invitation
children.description:
Social—Invitation
You can see your inviting code or input the inviting code from your friend in this page. If you input your friend's inviting code, you will get some rewards!

children.name: Space Bridge
children.description:
Shop—Space Bridge
You can get new characters by activating Space Bridge. There are three kinds of Space Bridge from which you can get different characters.

Free Activate
You can activate Space Bridge freely by waiting for the countdown timer reaching zero.

children.name: Item Shop
children.description:
Shop—Item Shop
You can purchase various items and packs at Item Shop by Space Coupon.

children.name: Charge
children.description:
Shop—Charge
Space Coupon is a currency in the game, by which you can purchase at shop or other services.

children.name: VIP
children.description:
Shop—VIP
VIP levels up with the increasing of the amount you charged.

VIP Privilege
VIP at every level contains some privileges and rewards.

children.name: Black Market
children.description:
Mall—Black Market
You can exchange your black market coins for different kinds of supplies here. The goods here will be updated at intervals.

children.name: Setting
children.description:
Others—Setting
You can adjust music and sound or other settings in Setting.

children.name: Help
children.description:
Others—Help
You can find your answers here when you run into problems

children.name: Collection
children.description:
Others—Collection
Characters once you obtained can be viewed in Collection at any time. You can view images of characters robot mode and alt mode.

children.name: Notification
children.description:
Others—Notification
Notifications of significant events or campaigns are shown here.
